thread.title: Anthony S Brown
thread.title_full: Gardner-White Furniture reviewed by Anthony S Brown

author: Anthony S Brown
title: Anthony S Brown
text:
Awesome experience
We had mike violi when We first bought a couch and the service and knowledge of mike made us feel comfortable in our decision to buy from them and he helped us find a couch we loved in our price range. We were so satisfied in our purchase and experience the first time that 2 months later we came back for our new dining room table. Again the service was amazing. Would definitely recommend to EVERYONE
